"Mag Jukebox":
"\"Mag Jukebox\" is a system that allows you to register music and play it wherever you like.

To register and play music, open the Main Menu with , then select \"Equipment/Subpalette\", then \"Mag\", then select \"Mag Jukebox\".
※This feature may be unavailable during some Emergency Quests."

"To register music, you need a Music Disc.

※Some Music Discs contain multiple tracks. This will be indicated in their Item Details."

"Music you have previously registered in PSO2 will also be available in your Mag Jukebox in NGS.

※Music from discs specific to NGS cannot be played in PSO2 blocks."
